thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 11 of 3586
thread.title: Marion

author: Marion
title: Marion
text: I recently ordered 7 Randy Wayne White (Randy Stryker series) books and they were delivered in 3 separate packages - they actually came from 3 different cities. First of all, only 6 books were delivered. Four of the paperbacks in the first 2 shipments are in poor quality. They are well worn, yellowed, and the covers are ripped or bent. The 2 books in the last shipment are in perfect condition and it is difficult to tell that they were even used at all. All of these books were purchased as a gift for my husband, so needless to say I felt a need to apologize to him. This was my first experience with Thrift Books so I'm not sure I'll take a chance again.
